_header: When Jesu Christ Lazarus had raised
_description: Gospel for Saturday after Fourth Sunday in Lent, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: When Iesus Lazarus had raisedSum of þe puple fast him praised…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …Trowed in Iesu for his sawAnd loued him and lered his law
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Dicebat Iesus turbis Iudeorum Ego sum lux.”
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.136-138.
